website_summaries.verdict: Fan moves quite a bit of air with 43-inch height. Offered at a reasonable price.
pros: The small 13-inch-by-13-inch footprint means this fan can go almost anywhere without getting in the way
The nighttime setting that dims the control display is a welcome convenience as well
cons: Some consumers complained of a clicking noise in the fan after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Lasko Portable Electric 42" Oscillating Tower Fan with Nighttime Setting
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It works beautifully. It does a great job of moving the air throughout my large master bedroom. I bought a Honeywell Quiet Set Whole Room Tower Fan. It works ok, but it didn’t really do a very good job at moving the air around the entire room. I needed to be standing right in front of it to feel the fan move the air. So I bought this Lasko Portable Electric 42" Oscillating Tower Fan. Now I feel great air movement.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen T Trandem

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful
customer_reviews.text: Even on the highest setting, this does not put out alot of air. I'd return it the box was thrown out. I bought it to replace an old on that's on its last leg, the old one even burnt out, puts out more air than this.
customer_reviews.author: Kym Morales

customer_reviews.title: I dont recommend this fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the positive reviews but I don’t recommend this fan. I tried every setting and it doesn’t throw out enough air to make a difference. I got rid of the box so I couldn’t return it. My wife went to Costco and bought a another fan and i was going to argue since I feel Costco sell cheap fans. we always throw them away but the fans she bought throws out more cooler air than Lasko. Side by side the Sierra fan wins. I have it next to me while im typing this review. I use it at night to sleep. I don’t recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing in so many ways!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this an excellent price, but the fan exceeds my expectations. It is aesthetically pleasing, doesn't take up much space, extremely quiet, seem very durable for long lasting use, and the easiest thing ever to attach to the platform it sits on. Shipping was lightning fast and it has helped cool my kitchen off tremendously already. Can't wait to get home and see how much cooler the kitchen is this evening.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hughes

customer_reviews.title: It’s very loud
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were so great I didn’t hesitate to buy this fan. BUT WHEN I TURNED IT ON!! It is so loud!! How am I supposed to sleep with this ?? Watch the video n see for yourself ... I’m very disappointed n will be sending this back
customer_reviews.author: AWHY

customer_reviews.title: This is not the oscillating fan you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these about 10ish years ago. Worked great and retired a few years ago after several years of almost daily use. Bought other fans since then. Decided to go back to this. It has an updated design and is awful. The highest setting barely blows at all. This fan also emits an annoying, whining squeak that assures you will not sleep. Looks like other reviewers have experienced this as well so I did not bother trying another. Had to truck this thing to a Kohl's since that was the only local place I could return it without a fee. Also of note, I bought the PollenTec filter accessory for this model and it was equally awful.
customer_reviews.author: iambeyoncealways

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and functions great!
customer_reviews.text: I love and trust Lasko brands. This one did not disappoint either. I love how the wood design on the fan matches my walnut living room furniture. It does add an appeal to the space aside from functionality and usefulness. We’ve been using it for weeks now and have no issues with it. It is quiet and gives off strong air. I love how it does not take too much space and very unobtrusive. Perfect for any living space! Only thing I wish Lasko will improve is their remote controls. Their rather cheap looking and sometimes not very sensitive to touch.
customer_reviews.author: May@36

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, the first one is older but doing fine. This is less than two weeks old and used for night time sleeping. It was doing just fine, but turned it on today and it won't work. Nothin, nada, we have tried plugging it in different outlets, tried the remote, tried manually, tried pressing different buttons. But nothing at all, It is very disappointing to have it not work after such a short time. I would have highly recommended this fan but given this situation I'm unable to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: LASKO HAS NEVER LET ME DOWN
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these Lasko Oscillating Fans for my home. These are replacements for the last 3 Lasko Oscillating Fans which I purchased several years ago. The fans are extremely easy to assemble. The noise level is much quieter than most oscillating fans. (Actually, I am a very light sleeper and I never hear the fan.) The oscillating fan puts out a lot of air on all 3 of the speed levels. The remote control is awesome and will work from across a master bedroom or family room. Lasko has never let me down!!! I Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: GSD LOVER

customer_reviews.title: Climate control unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan so far. “Fan” almost seems too pedestrian for this item. Maybe climate control unit might be better. The wood grain helps it look less intrusive in the room and it is very quiet, even while oscillating. Worth the price in spades.
customer_reviews.author: Paula K

customer_reviews.title: Best Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan, don't know if this is saying a lot if you are a fan corrosion, I am not. I am using this fan to replace a stand up fan in the old fashion style that was loud and obtrusive. This fan is great because it's colder than the other one and it's much quieter. I do not have to turn up the television to hear it, while this fan is running right next to my ear. I love my new fan. I would even buy another one if needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Potbelliedkiln

customer_reviews.title: quiet and nice wind
customer_reviews.text: it looks very nice. the timer and remote work well. i am happy with the noise level as it is lower than my other fans. keeps a nice breeze on my bed at night. pleased as the quality and functions of this fan. recommended.
customer_reviews.author: michaelray

customer_reviews.title: Great air circulation and it has a remote!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed great air circulation. I use this fan when I don't want to use the air conditioner. I just received it today and started using it right away. I have not used the remote yet because I don't have the AAA batteries required but the remote will come in handy when I don't want to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: G. Veras

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' my Lasko.
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to fans, I've always been partial to Lasko. I needed one for my new office and was able to find one at a great price and it also came with the wooden trim option so it matches my existing furniture. The very powerful for my office. For large rooms I think this will do fine, but this won't circulate air around a warehouse or whole house. It's got a minimal noise which is to be expected. It oscillates very quietly and the remote comes in quite handy. I'm very happy with this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Andy0811

customer_reviews.title: Louder than Honeywell Quietset
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my 4 year old Quietset which I knocked over and broke. I did research and this was recommended as the quietest. Although it does not make a lot of wind noise, it produces a hum from the moment that the power is turned on. This hum is constant no matter which power setting is chosen. It did seem that it produced more wind when it was on high, but since quiet operation was the most important factor for me, I'm returning it for another Honeywell Quietset.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Guru

customer_reviews.title: AAA FAN!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to replace an older oscillating fan and it’s great in the family room. Covers area perfectly, it’s quiet and was easy to assemble. The only issue I have is the remote has to be pointed directly at control area on the fan to be able to change speed or turn on or turn off oscillation. But that’s not that big of deal all in all. Love it and am purchasing a second one for my daughter’s room upstairs where it gets really warm
customer_reviews.author: Chantene

customer_reviews.title: Silverwood T42954 , Nighttime
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is definitely louder than expected. I think it's louder than my basic, white plastic 10 year old oscillating fan. The remote doesn't come with batteries, so that's fun... the whole fan moves when you try to press a button manually, and the cord is very short. Debating about returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: CMT926Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Still new, but oh so great!
customer_reviews.text: I already love this thing, my room gets so hot during the day and since I work nights I really need a cool space to rest. Plus I have a large dog with very thick fur who overheats easily. Even on the lowest setting my room is so much more comfortable. Also bought an electrostatic filter for the intake vents to keep the dog fur out since the inside isn't made to be cleaned. I'll have to edit this in about a month or so with the durability, but so far we're absolutely loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I owned an older model Lasko Wind Curve with the Ion feature, but gave it to my daughter. Kind of sorry that I did. Though several years of usage the fan was solid, quite, and worked perfectly. After moving I decided to purchase the non-Ion version. The first one I received had a noticeable 'tick' sound every time it hit one of the stops. Lasko was kind enough to replace it, but a year later the replacement is starting to make a buzzing sound while oscillating. Not sure if it's this specific model or if the manufacturing quality have decreased, but I can't recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Pergrem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an apartment
customer_reviews.text: Today the temperature outside was 97, with a feel of 108. My HVAC system in my apartment has been off/on working every other week so I bought this in hopes to have some form of moving air. I was desperate for anything. This machine was perfect! Blows enough air for comfort and is relatively quiet. I do feel that the flow is stronger than a box fan and helped relieve this stuffy apartment. It's fairly light and was easy to transfer from my living room to bedroom at night. Would recommend. However, like other reviews, mine came without screws.
customer_reviews.author: ktslider

customer_reviews.title: Bit of a Hum
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the Lasko Portable Electric 42" Oscillating Tower Fan. It's fairly quiet, but it does have an underlying hum, which some people might find annoying. It was well packaged and easy to put together. I like the oscillating feature, but wish it remembered oscillating so I didn't have to turn that on each time. It does remember your last speed. I haven't used time or night features.
customer_reviews.author: KLPNYCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: low air flow
customer_reviews.text: Using this for my wife, on a bed 100% of the time. She has a hard time using the remote, cant push the buttons or see what the controls are. Noise is higher than the regular circular lasko fan, the fan we had, burned up after 2 years of constant use. Good lasko product, tried the tower, wont be buying another tower, remote is hard to use, noise level is higher, not enough air flow. Night setting is nice, automatic for sleeping. Gave it to the daughter, went and bought a circular lasko today.
customer_reviews.author: domyownstuff

customer_reviews.title: So sad
customer_reviews.text: This fan does not blow. The first one i got you couldn't feel anything no matter what setting high or low it felt the same so i figured it was broken so i went ahead and got an exchange. The new one came today and low and behold the same thing happened. What a disappointment this is. No dont get it. 70 is too much for this fan not to work
customer_reviews.author: kelly foreman

customer_reviews.title: Giving it time, but first one broke in 32 days.
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 32 days. First it would not oscillate. Then as I was fortunate enough to be waiting on a replacement, even after the 30 day return window closed, it stopped working 100%. I did get a replacement and this one is working fine so far. I just hope it lasts. It’s an expensive item to potentially give out in 32 days and not have the option of another return.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3wifeof1:)

customer_reviews.title: Lasso Fan
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, I NEVER leave reviews but THIS FAN RIGHT HERE is the absolute BUSINESS. I get so hot at night so I keep it on 3 and it cools my entire room down. The noise is very minimal and it’s actually a pretty subtle white noise which helps me sleep. Very lightweight and easy to move around which I like because I move it between rooms when I work. The night setting is cool however I probably won’t use it until it cools down, in AZ I need full force air all night lol. Easy to set up, easy to use, definitely worth the money. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Aleia Pope

customer_reviews.title: Decent fan
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fan for a couple months now. It's decently powerful and pretty quiet, but you'd probably be better off with a standing bladed fan with an oscillating function. Air pours out of the fan from a narrow column in the center of the vents--the outer thirds of the vents are dead zones, so if you're not having the fan oscillate, you will have to position it carefully in order to feel the air. Also note that the remote doesn't come with a battery, though that wasn't a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just a great fan
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this fan because my the air conditioning in my home wasn't doing an adequate job keeping my home office cool, and now that COVID-19 has me working from home, I needed something to keep my office from getting hot and stuffy. This fan did the job wonderfully, and I liked it so much, I bought two more fans: one for my bedroom and one for my daughter's. The fan is quiet and circulates air very efficiently, even in large rooms. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cam Warren

customer_reviews.title: Lasko: Quality As Expected
customer_reviews.text: We've used Lasko for many years in our family. Lasko to us means dependability and quality for a fair price. If that's what you're looking for, look no more. Got this one cause we didn't want our freezers in the garage to overwork this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Stylish fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very nice. It has enough power to cool our entire living room. The remote control is lovely and overall it's better than expected. Very stylish, too, so blends in rather than stands out as eye sore.
customer_reviews.author: Nelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. It provides a great breeze in my bedroom so I can sleep without waking up with a stuffy nose. The fan is quiet enough not to disturb my sleep. It is a great addition to my AC, which turns off at night until the next morning after the house reaches the set temperature. The fan keeps cooling air circulating over my bed. It makes for a great night sleep. Nice to have the remote control so I don't have to get up to adjust the setting.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Powerful quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan came broken and I had to tape it up Since there was no way to glue it Or screw it down. The bottom came without screws so I had to make a trip to Home Depot. I bought it used so therefore I cannot degrade it completely. But it was not in good condition as the description said. Maybe it was busted up in the mail. But it could of been packaged much better too. Anyhow a couple hours later and I got it working. Just beware of used items.
customer_reviews.author: dexomatic

customer_reviews.title: Oh please, this brand is just top notch!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these Lasko stands now. A taller type in my living room and a smaller one for the bedroom. I bought the second one for the bedroom, because the one in the living room cools things off so well, and the second because my electric bill was going up, and I suspect that this is because I crank the air at night as I wake up if I get warm. I can now leave my thermostat at the setting that I use during the day because the little gem in the bedroom really cools it off. So glad that I bought them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula D.

customer_reviews.title: Cold on a hot summer night
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my room because my room tends to run hot. Long story short the fan is now in my son’s room because he loved it and wouldn’t stop trying to sleep in my room with the fan. He sets it on the highest setting no blanket, that fan gets freezing cold at night. I got tired of trying to keep him out of my room so we bought another one and he took the first one. Once he’s asleep I have to turn it down and cover him up because his room gets fridged with that fan on.
customer_reviews.author: Masterbobz

customer_reviews.title: Very large, quality control is hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered seems to have been damaged before it arrived because it made lots of noise, clangs and bangs, I returned it for a replacement, the replacement seems like a return or refurbished item, the bag was open and it was missing all screws and knobs necessary to attach the base. I don't consider it a negative, but this unit is huge, much bigger than any comparable I've seen. If space is an issue take that into consideration, ultimately I'm looking at other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if I got a defective item but this gives very low wind/air in even highest speed
customer_reviews.text: Box came in was torn in places, the item inside was packed with plastic that was duct taped in places to keep all together which made me think it could be a returned item but idk & not my point. I'm very disappointed with the item itself, even in highest speed the airflow is very low, I can hardly feel it from 6 ft distance standing straight to the fan, fairly noisy as well, my $15 walmart table fan does a better job than this(except that 1 is very noisy lol)!
customer_reviews.author: knight_darkness

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 4 stars if it oscillated like it was supposed to
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works for cooling you down if it’s blowing right on you. It reaches decently far for a fan. I would have given it 4 stars but it doesn’t oscillate like it should. I assembled and disassembled and reassembled and googled it and tried to fix it but it has never worked. You can tell that it’s supposed to because you can feel the motor that is supposed to make it oscillate when you twist it. I’d recommend the fan for sure to anyone if I knew that you would get one that actually worked. My roommate threw the box out before we realized it didn’t work properly so I was not able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is even bigger and nicer than we expected. It's extremely quiet and even though it doesn't feel like it's blasting on the highest setting, it makes the large, warm room noticeably cooler in less than 20 minutes. We are definitely happy with our purchase and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ecjohnkt

customer_reviews.title: Not that quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best fan I’ve ever had. On low it almost feels like an air conditioner. However, it’s not that quiet. Certainly better than my $14.99 fan that I replaced. In a large room I think it might seem quiet. In my bedroom it replaces my sleep machine that I use nightly. That being said, I’d buy again!
customer_reviews.author: AnnD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this fan. We’ve had it for less than 2 months and it started making a terrible noise when oscillating. Since we bought this to use in our bedroom it is not conducive to sleeping! My return window is closed so it looks like I can’t even return it for something else. We bought this because of the Lasko name as we have another Lasko tower fan that we have had for almost 10 years and never had a problem. Now we are stuck with a fan that was not a cheap purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SMT

customer_reviews.title: Does not move much air.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have several older Lasko tower fans. This tower blows about half as hard as the older versions. Not happy with this purchase. This doesn't move much air.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great, I had one I bought years ago that finally started to squeak. I still use it alot because smacking the top stops the squeaking for a while- BUT, I bought a second one for the bedroom and it's just as great. If it starts squeaking too in three or four years, no big deal. I run my fans nearly 24/7, so I am very pleased with that performance and lifespan ratio! The remote is great, the function is simple, it's got great air movement to it.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Just buy Waste Management stock. What a bunch of jerks!
customer_reviews.text: Trash! Used to be a great item, and even better value. This model has lost features and makes this awful rattling sound- - right out of the box! Zero quality control. You know how we know it’s trash? Amazon doesn’t even box it. AMZN boxes everything; especially an electronic item. This arrives in an original “shelf-space” box as if it isn’t important enough to protect. How naked of both companies... as if they own stock in landfills. Shameful really. And let’s not kid ourselves, they know what they are doing! Zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Nardozzi

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very powerful even on the lowest setting, and we love it so much we bought a second one. I don’t know how other reviewers are saying it’s noisy, because it’s as quiet as it can be. It can’t possibly be silent, but I don’t notice it at all.
customer_reviews.author: eawFF5

customer_reviews.title: First one great second one junk.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased. The first one lasted many years so when it quit I purchased another. I should have sent the second one back. It never oscillated but I decided to keep it and just not use that feature. Now its surging from low to high speed and back to low over and over. Is out of the one year warranty. I WILL NOT BUY ANOTHER. My fault should have sent it back when l noticed the first problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Locally there has been many fires for a couple of weeks and the weather has been warm so that with the fact that homes in my area art built with A/C and were unable to open windows due to ash and hazardous air quality I bought some fans and this is by far the best! I have it in our main living room running almost 24/7 and its held up like a champ. Will be buying more for other rooms in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Loud Buzzing Noise
customer_reviews.text: The fan works as expected, with reasonable fan speed options and airflow and a reasonably pleasant noise for sleeping use, however its motor produces an obnoxious buzzing noise which isn't blocked by doors or earplugs. This noise is more annoying than the noises I'm trying to use the fan to block out. The nighttime setting reduced the display brightness to 50% (which doesn't seem like much) and puts the fan at the highest speed. The buzzing noise is actually quieter at the highest fan speed.
customer_reviews.author: John Nagelkirk, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Lasko comes through again.
customer_reviews.text: I have several Lasko space heaters that are decorative and very efficient and quiet. This van is yet another happy Lasko purchase. I already have a Dyson blade fan and thought about getting a tower fan but really hesitated at the $300 price tag... This one was substantially less expensive still looks good and is incredibly quiet and effective. I highly recommend it. I haven’t tried the remote yet or The sleep mode yet so can’t comment.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra B. Meynard

customer_reviews.title: Electrical buzz from motor
customer_reviews.text: It is a fan, it rotates fine, however the range of oscillation is very small, and the remote surprisingly needed to be pointed very precisely to the top of the fan to be recognized. That is all acceptable, but my unit made a relatively loud electric buzz noise from the motor, too noticeable to have it in my bedroom, and the frequency of the noise is too high to be easy to ignore in the living room. This seems to be a common issue according to other reviews. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Culebro Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, Quiet-ish, Issues with Remote
customer_reviews.text: Good fan that really blasts the air. I use this in my office and it is not silent, but the noise isn't overwhelming either. Timer function is great. Remote has been a problem from the start. Works about 20 percent of the time, even with fresh batteries.
customer_reviews.author: DCA

customer_reviews.title: NOISY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought and returned two of these. Both made a rattling noise. One worse than the other. The description says they are quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Viejo hombre

customer_reviews.title: Quiet with very good air flow.
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced an older version of the same fan. I replaced only because the old unit died after 6 or 7 years of use and was always in use (wife's hot flashes)and my wife loved that fan, so she was very happy when I gave her this fan. She started using it right away it helps her dry the floors after she mops them. So you know that we recommend this fan to everybody that came to our house and likes this fan.
customer_reviews.author: JAR

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Works great, The remote control is a great feature. It is wobbly if you touch it or something hits it but it has a firm base. Place it in a corner and it does a great job. All control features are accurate
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Even damaged, it works
customer_reviews.text: In coastal California, nobody needs air conditioning. Almost nobody has it, except the chain restaurants & shopping mall stores. Coming up, forecast was for 80's and 90's. You laugh, but that's hot. We ordered the fan, which arrived with one button-speed setting-pushed in and inoperative. Remote is not effective, unless standing near the fan. No damage on the box and the fan was well -packaged. Dunno! Everything else works. It moves air and we will love its breeze.
customer_reviews.author: David K. Wittrock

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: For years, we have had an old, white oscillating fan. After recently redecorating, it was time for an upgrade. This fan was not overly expensive and had lots of options. It's so nice to set the speed, oscillating motion, etc. The sound is minimal too, which is a great feature and so much nicer than our old, retired fan. So glad the change was made!
customer_reviews.author: Cheralee Schliem

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite fan
customer_reviews.text: Now on second season and holding up well. We love this fan. It is quiet and we like the way it moves the air. Instead of a narrow tunnel of air, like some models. It moves a large area of air so it covers your whole body. We also think the wood grain front adds a little bit of class and fits in better with our living room furniture.
customer_reviews.author: chuckreviews

customer_reviews.title: Love my Lasko fan
customer_reviews.text: My Lasko fan came four days earlier than the projected delivery date. My happiness turned to disappointment, however, when I noticed that Amazon sent me an open boxed item instead of a new one. The return and replacement was no hassle. Got my replacement order two days later. Assembly was a snap. About 10 minutes later I was sitting in my easy chair enjoying the cool breeze from my new Lasko. What's more, this fan is so quiet, you can almost forget that its there. I give this product five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Andall

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with an exceptional fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first one three weeks and the second one a week later. This is a perfect fan for a large room, although we’re going overboard and using both in the same room as it’s consistently reaching over 100 degrees locally and we’re taking steps to minimize AC use. These units are very well built, quiet, good strong motor and air flow, and attractive to boot. The remote has all the controls you need...power, speed, oscillation, timer, and night function. Couldn’t be more satisfied. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KevinG

customer_reviews.title: The Remote should be illuminated because it can't be seen when the lights are low or off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for my bedroom, as I have a swamp cooler, which looses its effect on days over 100, and we've had a string of this year. 113-115 many days. It's been great at the foot of my bed, along with the overhead fan. But, strangely enough, its lowest setting isn't breeze-like, so have to physically move the fan away. If you need a fan to accommodate a living room of any size, this fan isn't powerful enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sassafrass

customer_reviews.title: High pitch noise from motor
customer_reviews.text: This fan takes up little space in our house and doesn't look out of space. The output of air is great, even at level 1. What I don't like is the high pitch noise the motor produces. I can't use it in the bedroom. My forty old Sanyo box fan clearly outperforms this Lasko Tower fan in the sleeptest.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Graafland

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan. I had 3 tower fans. This was one of them and the best. It really does cool you down and doesn't just move hot air around. My daughter's fan broke, so I have this one to her to use and I took one of the other ones. What a difference. The other fan did nothing. I went to Amazon and found my fan and immediately bought it. Yep...back to paradise!
customer_reviews.author: SMariaMazTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dont listen-- It's Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I havent even explored the remote or sleep functions yet-- but despite what some have said, this is SUPER QUIET - and assembly could not be easier..a few minutes at most. As soon as I can get to the store for batteries I will , I'm sure, become addicted to that! I worried that this would not be as powerful as a blade fan-- but IT IS -- even at the lowest setting! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good value, easy to assemble and performs to expectation.
customer_reviews.text: Very quickly assembled out of the box. Simple remote that performs all needed features. Make sure you have AAA batteries for the remote to function. Air flow is steady and the oscillating mode excellent. The noise level is slightly higher than expected but not problematic. It is used primarily at night and has allowed us to not use A/C at night with a very comfortable sleep environment. Portability is easy and in my wife's home office it is becoming a fixture. Good value and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: john kin

customer_reviews.title: A handsome unit, but not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: A very attractive air conditioner, but not very powerful. I tested this unit against a regular box fan and found the box fan had more power. I don’t believe this unit will hold up to Ohio’s (I know other places get hotter during summer than Ohio, but since I don’t live in those places, I won’t focus on them in this review) hot summers. I will be returning this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Angeles Joestar Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet Fan, Great Cooling Ability
customer_reviews.text: The fan does a great job at cooling the immediate area in front of it as it oscillates, but it's not quite powerful enough to cool an entire room. If you just need to cool a specific area or plan on sitting in front of it (even if it's 10-20ft away) you'll absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.author: zster9000

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Often a fan is good enough in our ‘dry’ climate. By mid-summer the sound of three box fans blowing high, is annoying. From time of ordering, looked forward to this quiet fan with a remote (!) to use at bedside. All expectations exceeded. Arrived perfect shape with an Easy set up. Fan and Remote A+.
customer_reviews.author: capnchaos

customer_reviews.title: Powerful fan with very high noise level even at the lowest speed.
customer_reviews.text: So we bought this fan and began to use it just 2 months ago. Even though our purchase goes back about 2 years, we did not use it much due to noise. We have used it for about 7 days now and I am now upset with it that I just bought Honewell fan, it is very quiet and now we have four of them. It was a mistake trying a new fan - this one. Will not make the same mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: NAYAB Z NAQVI

customer_reviews.title: BOTTOM LINE CONSUMERS
customer_reviews.text: 1. Doesn't oscillate the entire room, just a small area. The speed, 3, wish there was a 4 or better 5 because I CAN'T FEEL IT. I would have to be up close in order for me to get some air. I DON'T LIKE THIS PRODUCT, it sucks. This poor fan must've done something in order for it to be acting this way. ""BOTTOM LINE CONSUMERS: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY""
customer_reviews.author: Rocco's mawma

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected lack of tech help when unit does not work .
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to get ahold of Lasko for two days no one available to take a call or on line ! I have purchased four of these fans and three work wonderfully . The forth one makes a terrible noise when turned on . All I want is help to remedy the problem or another working model .Please get back to me asap . omenfish314@icloud.com Thank you Gail
customer_reviews.author: Gail Robins

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan/Circulates Air Well/Fairly Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely happy with this fan it is quiter than my other Lasko fan. It was easy to assemble great air circulation it cools my living room and my bedroom very well Before I got this fan I was using 2 fans in each room Seller shipped item quickly and free shipping I will definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: It keeps us cool!!
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. It’s quiet and very nice look and quality. Came with remote; has sleep option and timer. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is that it’s not that powerful. Don’t get me wrong, it does have power but I think I was expecting a little more.
customer_reviews.author: SMD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice fan. Not only does it blow air well, it blows cold air! It’s going to be perfect for summer to leave on when you don’t need the AC, or to move the AC through the house. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M Kovacs

customer_reviews.title: Safe, quite and cools nicely!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan!! I bought it for our special needs adult son. I liked it due to no rotating fan blades and is safer for him! Liked it so much, I ordered another one for me! It's quite, puts out just the right amount of air and it looks great in any room!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Solid investment!  Worth every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is awesome! So happy the other one broke! This is so much quite on high! I slept all night with it on high and night mode, I need another one for the front room. So easy to assemble, 5 mi uses, I kid you not and ready to go. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received
customer_reviews.text: I received it yesterday, during the time but, I am asking why I am paying for prime. because it's not 2 day delivery anymore. I will update later on how it works.
customer_reviews.author: shiningdaimond

customer_reviews.title: Does not blow cool air
customer_reviews.text: I was swayed by the high star reviews for this product instead of reading the negative reviews. Big mistake. This fan is weak even at its highest setting... It makes my $12 fan looks good. This is a complete waste of money and does not match the positive reviews and descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works in Texas summer heat
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly strong fan that is fairly quiet for its size. I use it in a sunroom in Texas that doesn’t have air conditioning. I have two fans in the room (it’s a large room) and they are sufficient for keeping the room comfortable for us to be in during the heat of the Texas summer day, even without AC in that room. They make minimal noise and we are able to watch tv and talk without being drowned out by the fans.
customer_reviews.author: PhD Mom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best standing fan I have ever owned. It’s quite, blower works really well, attractive, and it comes with a remote!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, powerful and pretty!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan, it was just what I needed. I live in an great studio apartment that has a wall mounted heating/air conditioning unit that’s great but wanted something near my bed to keep me cool at night and this fan is perfect. I love the different speeds for times when it’s hotter than others and the oscillating option is the cherry on top!!!! Plus it’s pretty to look at and pretty quiet!!!! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Roma's Maga

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, durable but too much packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these fans and they are very strong and also reliable. Quiet enough to run all night in a bedroom. The remote and many options for modes and timers are great features. My only complaint is the absolutely excessive packaging. So much plastic! The remote is in a small plastic bag inside another plastic bag. I am not even mentioning the styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: LuAnne

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, quiet and efective
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason this one is number one or two in every lbest fan list I researched. It is absolutely amazing, almost as good as an air conditioner. Its is very silent too, the light is almost non existent so I don't get the reviews that said it kept them up at night. We've actually bought a second one since, for another room. Plus it looks very cool and it's lightweight and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Karyna Kouruklis

customer_reviews.title: Moves a surprising amount of air, makes ZERO noise.
customer_reviews.text: I wish this thing had some more power behind it and made more noise. If you are looking for fan that make ZERO noise, this is for you! The oscillation is awesome, it moves a great deal of air and the remote is handy and works from any angle.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher.C

customer_reviews.title: Shipping box and item both damaged!!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast! But sadly the fan I damaged. I noticed the box when arrived has dent on side and I can see pieces of foam and so I open it thought the fan is ok but nope the damage on the fan is more serious than what it look outside the box.Pretty good size of dent On the top side of the fan head cover the plastic cracked around it and a string of plastic sticking out about 4inch long and then on the side of the fan (right side) there’s a line there the impacted of the dent caused a bigger gap about 3inch long. Wish I can attach pictures here
customer_reviews.author: Charlyn M.

customer_reviews.title: I’ve bought two!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. I bought one over a year ago and I just purchased a second one. They are not easy to move because the fan disconnects from the stand which is why I bought two. They are quiet and produce a lot of air. Plus they are sleek and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cool and quiet and well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase and enjoy this fan very much! One of the rooms of our attic gets pretty toasty during warmer months but this fan has so far allowed the pets to comfortably hang out with us. It's cooler than any other fan we've purchased and is perfectly quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Alice McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a damaged box line the box was all taped up with packaging tape. Surprise must have been returned or they just shipped it ou any old way. Fortunately It works. Nice cooling fan with your air conditioner on. Spread cooling evenly.
customer_reviews.author: rkwsr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It’s incredibly awesome especially when you have allergies. It really helps me sleep better at night when it’s easier to breath with a break from my allergies. The fan is quiet and works exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: W3B

customer_reviews.title: Quality and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Lasko tower fans. Great great quality. I bought this one to replace an old lasko tower that lasted 9 years. As my son would say. Lets get a lasko that can last another 10 years. I hope this one could. Great dispersal of air. I wish it rotates more than it should. Otherwise, its quite enough that u didn’t know its ON. No squeaky noise for now.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdinand

customer_reviews.title: Loud and cheaply made - hard pass
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this fan is incredibly cheap, and it’s so loud that it’s simply unacceptable. Clicks when it’s on any speed and overall a very disappointing purchase. I went with a Honeywell tower fan and it’s whisper silent, unlike this clunky piece of junk that was returned within a day of opening. Keep looking further if you want something decent!!
customer_reviews.author: Wilda

customer_reviews.title: If it were only 12 inches higher it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The 1st fan arrived in record time but it was defective. I received a refund promptly, so I purchased 2 more and they are perfect except for one thing. 12 inches too short. If they were higher it would reach my entire body as I sit in in a desk chair, but if I'm on the couch its just fine. Great fans as always Laskco.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Check to be sure it’s a new unit.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is quiet and moves a good amount of air. This is the 2nd unit I received, I returned the 1st unit because it didn’t oscillate. After receiving the 2nd unit it became apparent that the first had been reboxed. That’s a bit disconcerting but I am pleased with the new unit. It does exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S

customer_reviews.title: It's overall a good fan, just kind of noisy.
customer_reviews.text: It's overall a good fan. It's not as powerful as other lasko fan that I have, but that's the reason I chose this one. However, there is a electric hummming noise whenever it's on, not sure it's just the one I got or all of them have the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Very cooling, looks great, FAR too loud
customer_reviews.text: This fan is attractive. It’s a large fan, tall and wide. The fan does a great job of moving air and is very affective, but this fan is LOUD, even on low, and the noise is a sort of “ticking” kind of humming. I’m keeping it because I like how tall it is and the air flow, but I won’t be able to watch TV with it on. I hope I can sleep with it running. Very annoying noise! It was very easy to put together, no tools necessary.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good Strong Air Flow
customer_reviews.text: This tower fan stands high enough to give a good breeze at my bed height, and the air flow is strong enough to feel really good on hot nights, with just enough noise to lull you to sleep. I strongly recommend this tower fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is a good fan that circulates the air very well. I find that it is quiet and doesn't interrupt my sleeping. It looks like a piece of furniture and not just a fan. I have an air conditioner in my bedroom and the fan is a great addition. This is the second Lasko fan I own and I find them to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I would like to see more air come from the highest setting
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely like to have seen a lot more wind come out of this product especially on the highest setting I believe that the highest setting should be the middle setting and more wind come from the top setting. I’m not going to return it but definitely want something stronger I uploaded a video in comparison with my old personal desk fan the size of my hand Dusty needs to be cleaned Varnado fan and Definitely of course the Lasko 42 inch wind curve fan put out a lot more air however I definitely want to search for something with a higher Velocity wind production output setting.
customer_reviews.author: Kim (a BIG fan of a GREAT fan)

customer_reviews.title: Faulty item
customer_reviews.text: I received it when the weather is cooling down. The package was repackaged as somebody opened it before. I didn’t open the box for a month and then Indian summer hit and got hot again. I took the fan out of the box and assembled it and IT DIDN'T WORK. I bought 2 of them, one is working and the other one is not working. It already passed the return date. Unbelievable. Tip for everyone, don't trust it. You should open and try it, DON'T WAIT LIKE ME!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ARTY

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: intially i bought one for my parents because they do not have air conditioning and they want to save money from getting one. then my uncle saw it and wants to buy one too, then my grandma saw it and liked it too. I bought 3 in less than a month
customer_reviews.author: Victor halo

customer_reviews.title: Great, quiet fan.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect fan for my room. I bought it for the height because my bed is taller than normal. Works great. It's quiet and cools a room very well. One thing that would be great is for the remote to be backlit for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Johnfam

customer_reviews.title: Like being in the room with a jet engine
customer_reviews.text: Very, very noisy fan. It makes a whistling/grinding noise when even set at the lowest setting. It does blow rather well and the remote is great, but this is not the fan to put in a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Every feature I have used on the unit works fine. Easy to assemble. The build seems a bit flimsy, but it moves air and does the job. Nice looking unit too! Using it in my office and depending on the fan speed it does not move papers on my desk - a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Big Food Guy

product_meta.title: Lasko Portable Electric 42" Oscillating Tower Fan with Nighttime Setting, Timer and Remote Control for Indoor, Bedroom and Home Office Use, Silverwood T42954
product_meta.description:
The Lasko T42954 Tower Fan is 42.5” tall with a woodgrain face and grey body. The sturdy plastic base assembles easily with a phillips-head screwdriver, and occupies a 13” x 13” footprint on your floor. This sleek, vertical space saving design allows you to put the stand up fan in small places, where pedestal & box fans won’t fit, without sacrificing air circulation, comfort or style. 



 Powered by 3 quiet speeds, this fan helps you beat the heat. If you live in the heat with no central air, or your window units do a poor job of moving air around your home or apartment, this fan creates excellent air flow and will help make you feel cooler. This standing fan delivers excellent air flow but is still quiet enough to hear the TV – even on HIGH. It creates just the right amount of white noise making it ideal for sleeping at night when it’s warm and stuffy. Perfectly sized to aim over a high bed and powerful enough to reach across the room.



 This electric plug-in fan is portable and easy to operate and comes with remote control, optional oscillation, programmable timer and a Nighttime Setting that automatically dims the control display and puts the fan on High for an hour, then Medium for an hour, and then stays on Low until you interact with the fan again. The remote is great for when you don’t feel like getting up to change the settings.



 Lasko has been making quality household products for over 100 years. Lasko tower fans are ETL Listed and come with our patented Blue Plug safety fuse technology making them a safe choice for a cooling breeze when it’s hot and humid outdoors.
feature_bullets: BEAT THE HEAT – Powered by 3 speed settings H/M/L, fan is perfectly sized to aim over a high bed and powerful enough to blow across the room. If you live in the heat with no central air, and window AC units do a poor job of moving air around your whole house or apartment, this fan creates excellent air flow making you feel cooler.

VERY QUIET – Fan creates a powerful breeze, but even on H, you can still hear the TV. Easy to assemble and operate. Comes with built-in carry handle, optional oscillation and energy efficient auto shut off timer programmable from 0. 5 to 7. 5 hours. The remote is the best when you don’t feel like getting up to change the settings. Widespread oscillation

SLEEP LIKE A BABY – Circulates the warm & stuffy air at night so you can get some rest. Creates just the right amount of white noise at bedside for sleeping. Nighttime Setting automatically dims the control display and sets the fan on (H) for an hour, then (M) for an hour, and then stays on (L) until you interact with the fan again.

A REAL SPACE SAVER – Standing 43” tall with a small 13” x 13” footprint, the sleek, vertical design optimizes floor space letting you to put the fan in places where pedestal & box fans won’t fit, without sacrificing air circulation, comfort or style. Ideal for the dorm, kitchen, living room, RV and camper.

TRUSTED FOR GENERATIONS – Lasko has been making quality household products for over 100 years. Lasko fans are ETL Listed, come with our patented Blue Plug safety fuse technology, and are backed by a 1-yr limited , making them a safe choice for a cooling breeze when it’s hot and humid outdoors.
